summary: 2008 FORD FOCUS SE AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION BEGAN HARD DOWNSHIFTING AT ABOUT 30,000 MILES.  DEALERSHIP STATED IT NEEDED"FLASHING".  LEFT IT ONE DAY PICKED IT UP SHIFTED FINE.  HAD NEW BATTERY INSTALLED APPROXIMATELY 2 YEARS AGO, BAD SHIFTING STARTED AGAIN.  DEALERSHIP MAINTAINS OUT OF WARRANTY.  CAR NOW HAS 58,000 MILES ON IT AND BAD TRANSMISSION.  ENGINE FLOGS AT SLOW SPEEDS EVER SINCE PURCHASED.  NO RELIEF IN SIGHT.   WARMER IT GETS OUTSIDE, WORSE TRANSMISSION BEHAVES.  THESE THINGS HAPPEN ALL OVER TOWN, THE CAR IS NOT CHOOSEY!!
